select count(device_id) from tab_device

SELECT device_id,device_no,device_type_id,last_login_time,SUM(total_test_income) AS totalTestIncome FROM tab_device
status=1
and to_days(last_login_time) = to_days(now())
and DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) <= date(last_login_time)
and DATE_FORMAT( last_login_time,'%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE( ) , '%Y%m')
GROUP BY device_no ORDER BY totalTestIncome DESC LIMIT 0 ,10
